description: I use Waveform for instrumental recording and really like it! It's nice to see that they are adopting flatpak packaging

Only been using this DAW for a couple weeks now, so I am currently learning it's ins and outs. Coming from pro tools and Sonar, which Sonar has been my DAW for many years. I found this, while looking for a good free alternative to Sonar for Windows and Linux. This is a fantastic program. Very easy to install your vst's. Straight forward interface. Performace, hardware wise, has been excellent. Great results, recording voice overlay work in the short time I have used it. I definitley recommend this music workstation.
Will NOT stop whining about buying a license, but the website doesn't even offer a license for WF11. Completely worthless.
summary: Can't buy it if I wanted to

description: I run it on virtual box for check and there it work fine. Look very well but don't work on fedora for now.

Excelente DAW para producción musical, bastante fácil de utilizar una vez se entiende su modo de trabajo. Además cuenta con una versión Pro y otra Free.

Al descargar la app funciona en modo de prueba con varias restricciones. Al ingresar nuestra cuenta (Free o Pro) se habilitan todas las funciones.

Flatpak: Funciona muy bien en Fedora 36. Por defecto solo me dejaba usar la carpeta Documentos y no me reconocía todos mis VST, pero luego de usar la app Flatseal para otorgar acceso a las carpetas que deseo todo va perfecto.
